Description: Pottery ostracon, with two lightly incised lines of Coptic on exterior, from the rim of a vessel, inside rim black band with four white circles, on interior of vessel body white outline oval.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394048) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394048)
